title: Right Now
brief_description: Looks at the issues for families when their child has been diagnosed as having an obvious disability at birth. Families talk about their initial shock, sorrow and disappointment, illustrates how early intervention can assist by providing families with information, support, and practical guidelines for them with their child at home.
